org.jogger.http
Interface Response

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockResponse, ServletResponse
public interface Response

Represents an HTTP Response.

Author:
German Escobar

print

Response print(String html)
Writes an HTML string into the response.

Parameters:
html - the HTML code to write in the response.
Returns:
itself for method chaining.

render

Response render(String templateName)
Renders the specified template with no additional attributes (besides those already in the response)

Parameters:
templateName - the name of the template to be rendered.
Returns:
itself for method chaining.

render

Response render(String templateName,
                Map<String,Object> attributes)
Renders the specified template with the specified attributes (and those already in the response). If an attribute with the same name already exists in the response it will be overriden.

Parameters:
templateName - the name of the template to be rendered.
attributes - a map of attributes to be passed to the view.
Returns:
itself for method chaining.

redirect

void redirect(String path)
Sends a redirect.

Parameters:
path - the path to which the request is redirected.
